column4: when downloading an o/s image, do i wanta  package install, or a minimal install? or should i stick with a live cd?
Well it depends, livecd is probably the easiest for most, unless your on notebook
yeh im on a laptop, i installed ubuntu with a live cd though. what is the difference between a package install and a minimal install?
Minimal will just install a cli, packages is probably just additional packages you might require
